sentences.sContent: This may have been a draw for the royal couple, since Prince William apparently enjoys his scuba, according to ABC News.
sentences.sContent_eng: This may have been a draw for the royal couple, since Prince William apparently enjoys his scuba, according to ABC News.
sentences.sCn: 这可能是吸引到这对皇家夫妇的地方，因为威廉王子，据ABC广播公司新闻网说，是很喜欢水肺潜水的。

remMethod.val: s(看作S形状的) + cuba(音似： 哭吧) → 潜水时丢了水中呼吸器只有哭吧 → 水中呼吸器
